system.description:
Requirements: you must have mastered one or more Classes among Tinkerer and Wayfarer, and have acquired the Faithful Companion (construct Species) and Visionary Skills.

Your companion's base Affinity towards bolt damage is replaced with Absorption, and their maximum Hit Point score is increased by an amount equal to 【twice your Skill Level in Visionary】.

When your companion deals damage, if they have no weapons equipped, they deal extra damage equal to 【your Skill Level in Visionary】.
